org.opendaylight.controller.config.api

Interface ConfigRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LookupRegistry, ServiceReferenceReadableRegistry
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigRegistryClient, ConfigRegistryImplMXBean, ConfigRegistryMXBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigRegistryImpl, ConfigRegistryJMXClient, TestingConfigRegistry

    public interface ConfigRegistry
extends LookupRegistry, ServiceReferenceReadableRegistry
    Provides functionality for working with configuration registry - mainly creating and committing config transactions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static javax.management.ObjectName OBJECT_NAME
      Only well-known ObjectName in configuration system, under which ConfigRegisry is registered.

    • Method Summary

      Verifies and commits transaction.

      java.util.List<javax.management.ObjectName> getOpenConfigs()

      Will return true unless there was a transaction that succeeded during validation but failed in second phase of commit.

    • Field Detail

      • OBJECT_NAME

        static final javax.management.ObjectName OBJECT_NAME
        Only well-known ObjectName in configuration system, under which ConfigRegisry is registered.

    • Method Detail

      • beginConfig

        javax.management.ObjectName beginConfig()
        Opens new configuration transaction.
        Returns:
        ObjectName of ConfigTransactionControllerMXBean

      • commitConfig

        CommitStatus commitConfig(javax.management.ObjectName transactionControllerON)
                          throws ConflictingVersionException,
                                 ValidationException
        Verifies and commits transaction.
        Parameters:
        transactionControllerON - ObjectName of ConfigTransactionControllerMXBean that was received in beginConfig() method call.
        Returns:
        CommitStatus
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if validation fails
        ConflictingVersionException - if configuration state was changed

      • getOpenConfigs

        java.util.List<javax.management.ObjectName> getOpenConfigs()
        Returns:
        list of open configuration transactions.

      • isHealthy

        boolean isHealthy()
        Will return true unless there was a transaction that succeeded during validation but failed in second phase of commit. In this case the server is unstable and its state is undefined.

      • getAvailableModuleNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAvailableModuleNames()
        Returns:
        module factory names available in the system

      • lookupRuntimeBeans

        java.util.Set<javax.management.ObjectName> lookupRuntimeBeans()
        Find all runtime beans
        Returns:
        objectNames

      • lookupRuntimeBeans

        java.util.Set<javax.management.ObjectName> lookupRuntimeBeans(java.lang.String moduleName,
                                                            java.lang.String instanceName)
        Find all runtime of specified module
        Parameters:
        moduleName - of bean
        instanceName - of bean
        Returns:
        objectNames
